title: Adelaide Hills Vineyard Retreat with Breakfast Provisions & Welcome Bottle of Wine
description: Let South Australia's striking Adelaide Hills region enchant you during a romantic escape filled with good food and fine wine at the picturesque Longview Vineyard. Located less than an hour's drive from Adelaide, just outside the historic township of Macclesfield, this stunning, family-owned vineyard is one of the region's most awarded wine producers. Longview offers not only fine wine and delectable food, but also beautifully styled suites nestled amid 200 acres of rolling hills and verdant vineyards - making this the perfect retreat for lovers of the finer things in life.
offer_address: 154 Pound Road, Macclesfield, South Australia 5153, Australia

title: Award-Winning Five-Star Adelaide Hills Vineyard Escape with Wine Tastings, Room Upgrade & Daily Breakfast
description:
Drink in the splendour of the renowned Adelaide Hills wine region from the iconic Mount Lofty House, awarded Tripadvisor's 2023 #1 Luxury Hotel and #1 Small Hotel in Australia and The South Pacific. Be enveloped by beautifully appointed accommodation, breathtaking views of Mount Lofty and the Piccadilly Valley and over 170 years of history. Heritage meets grandeur at this awe-inspiring 19th-century estate, reminiscent of a stately English country manor, with 30 acres of sprawling vines and manicured gardens. The cherry on top? The three-chef-hatted deliciousness at Hardy’s Verandah Restaurant.

A five-star oasis of serenity, with all the trimmings needed for an indulgent gourmet escape: it’s hard to believe this storied setting is just a 20-minute drive from Adelaide's CBD. After days spent exploring over 200 vineyards and cellar doors in the Adelaide Hills, Barossa Valley and McLaren Vale, treat yourself to a smoke-infused tipple at Arthur Waterhouse Lounge, soak up the views at Terrace Garden Bar or relax at the hands of an expert spa therapist at Gatekeeper's Day Spa.
location_description: Mount Lofty House Estate - Adults Retreat
offer_address: 1 Mawson Drive, Crafers, Adelaide Hills 5152, South Australia

A five-star oasis of serenity, with all the trimmings needed for an indulgent gourmand escape, it’s hard to believe that this storied setting is just a 20-minute drive from Adelaide's CBD. Feel a world apart from anywhere else: treat yourself to a smoke-infused tipple at Arthur Waterhouse Lounge & Bar, named after the one-time estate owner, lavish in the attention of an expert spa therapist or take a wander through the grounds as if they were your own, after a day of vineyard hopping, of course.

title: Five-Star Boutique Adelaide Hills Vineyard Escape with Award-Winning Dining
description:
Drink in the splendour of Adelaide Hills’ renowned wine region and the breathtaking beauty of Piccadilly Valley with a stay at the heritage Mount Lofty House - MGallery by Sofitel, a five-star property with almost 150 years of history. Revel in award-winning decadence in true Sofitel style at this renowned boutique hotel that feels a million miles away, yet is only a 20-minute drive from Adelaide CBD.

Embark on a gourmand experience with a welcome glass and complimentary bottle of the renowned Mount Lofty Summit sparkling on arrival, daily à la carte breakfast, A$50 dining credit to put towards the three-chef-hatted Hardy’s Verandah Restaurant - voted the 'Best Restaurant in a Hotel in Australia' at the Australian Hotels Association Awards - and so much more.
location_description: Mount Lofty House - MGallery by Sofitel June 2020
offer_address: 1 Mawson Drive, Crafers SA 5152

title: Award-Winning Adelaide Hills Heritage Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Unwind at this elegant heritage hotel, a gateway to the picturesque Adelaide Hills and home to award-winning wineries, just 20 minutes from the city. Built in the 19th century, the hotel is home to one of Adelaide's first pubs, steeped in history and charm. The interior honours its heritage, with a Wine Room offering a 10,000+ bottle collection that is one of the best representations of wine in Australia.

Step into the award-winning pub and explore an ever-changing drinks menu, alongside a European-inspired dining selection. When you're ready to explore, the treasures of Adelaide Hills await. Follow winding, tree-lined roads to renowned wineries like Tapanappa Wines, just a five-minute drive from the hotel, or discover a host of distilleries, microbreweries, chocolatiers, fromageries and more, all within easy reach.
offer_address: 8 Main Street, Crafers, Adelaide, South Australia 5152, Australia

title: Award-Winning Adelaide Hills Vineyard Escape with Wine Tastings & Daily Breakfast
description:
Drink in the splendour of the Adelaide Hills’ renowned wine region from the iconic Mount Lofty House - MGallery by Sofitel, ranked within the top 1% of properties worldwide in Tripadvisor’s Travellers’ Choice Awards 2020. Heritage meets grandeur at this breathtaking 19th-century estate, which offers a stately, English-country-manor-feel with 30 acres of sprawling vines and manicured gardens, complemented by three-chef-hatted deliciousness at Hardy’s Verandah Restaurant.

A five-star oasis of serenity, with all the trimmings needed for an indulgent gourmet escape, it’s hard to believe that this storied setting is just a 20-minute drive from Adelaide's CBD. Feel a world apart from anywhere else: treat yourself to a smoke-infused tipple at Arthur Waterhouse Lounge & Bar, named after the one-time estate owner, lavish in the attention of an expert spa therapist or take a wander through the grounds as if they were your own, after a day of vineyard hopping, of course.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Start each day with a continental and à la carte breakfast
- Celebrate your escape with a bottle of Mount Lofty sparkling wine on arrival
- Indulge in a plate of cookies and a welcome drink on arrival

location_description: Mount Lofty House Estate - Adults Retreat
offer_address: 1 Mawson Drive, Crafers, Adelaide Hills 5152, South Australia

title: Adelaide Hills Ultra-Lux Adults-Only Lodge Escape with Daily Breakfast, A$150 Dining or Spa Credit & Wine Experiences
description:
Welcome to the Ultra-Lux Sequoia Lodge, one of Australia's most exquisite, adults-only, premium luxury lodges, epitomising unparalleled elegance in the Adelaide Hills. This is the ultimate romantic retreat package: make the most of the lodge's high-end facilities with A$150 credit towards spa or dining (or A$250 for stays of 3+ nights) and indulge further with daily a la carte breakfast, a complimentary minibar, and wine experiences. Enjoy a dip in the panoramic infinity pool, take a morning guided nature walk or relax in artesian hot pools fed by the mountain’s natural springs. Be enveloped by a world of sophistication and impeccable service during this truly unique experience that offers guests beautifully appointed accommodation paired with breathtaking views of Mount Lofty and Piccadilly Valley. Located a mere 20 minutes from Adelaide's CBD, this hidden gem is so close yet so far from the everyday.

When it comes to dining, Sequoia Lodge offers culinary experiences like no other with three gourmet restaurants, four bars and a 4000 bottle wine cellar; dine in Sequoia Lounge, Hardy's Verandah Restaurant, Martha Hardy's Kitchen or the privacy of your suite, with menus crafted with the finest local ingredients, celebrating the flavours of the famous surrounding wine regions. For ultimate relaxation, indulge at Gatekeeper's Day Spa, offering a range of luxurious treatments. Days can be spent exploring over 200 vineyards and cellar doors in the Adelaide Hills, Barossa and McLaren Vale, Mount Lofty Botanic Garden and Cleland Wildlife Park.
offer_address: 1 Mawson Drive, Crafers, South Australia 5152,  Australia

title: Multi-Award-Winning Adelaide Hills Vineyard Retreat with Wine Tasting & Daily Breakfast
description:
Let South Australia's striking Adelaide Hills region enchant you during a relaxing escape filled with good food and fine wines at the award-winning Longview Vineyard. Located less than an hour's drive from Adelaide, just outside the historic township of Macclesfield, this stunning, family-owned winery is one of the region's most awarded wine producers, taking home two Australian Bridal Industry Awards in 2020 as well as Gold from the Adelaide Hills Wine Show in both 2020 and 2019. Longview offers not only fine wines and delectable food, but also beautifully styled suites nestled amid the verdant vineyards - making this the perfect retreat for lovers of the finer things in life.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Wake up each morning to delicious breakfast provisions to enjoy in the comfort of your suite
- Celebrate on arrival with a bottle of wine waiting in your suite
- Visit the cellar door and enjoy a complimentary tasting of some of the vineyard's best wines

**Travelling as a family or group?** Upgrade to the Longview Homestead Shiraz suite, located in the estate's lovingly restored homestead, and offering enough room for up to four guests.
offer_address: 154 Pound Rd, Macclesfield SA 5153 Australia

title: Luxe Adelaide Hills Heritage Escape
description: Unwind at The Crafers Hotel, a heritage hotel in the Adelaide Hills. This renovated property is steeped in history - opening its doors in the early 19th-century as one of Adelaide’s first pubs. The interior pays tribute to its past with a Wine Room serving a variety of rare and classic local and international wines. Beer and cider enthusiasts need not miss out: pull up a seat in the historic pub and check out the extensive, everchanging drinks menu alongside a mouthwatering French-inspired dining menu. The treasures of Adelaide Hills are also at your fingertips. Spend days exploring the rolling hills and countless vineyards and wineries of the region. Follow winding roads flanked by pine trees to renowned wineries like The Lane Vineyard (only a 15-minute drive from the hotel), plus countless distilleries, microbreweries, chocolatiers, fromageries, and more.
offer_address: 8 Main Street, Crafers, Adelaide, South Australia 5152, Australia

title: Boutique Adelaide Hills Escape
description:
Immerse yourself in the blissful, picture-perfect beauty of Adelaide Hills with a dreamy stay at The Stirling Hotel, just 20 minutes from Adelaide's CBD. This historic hotel serves as the ideal launchpad for exploring the unmissable sights nearby and features just five individually decorated rooms packed with personality and charm. Inside each room, you’ll find large ensuite bathrooms, comfortable sitting areas, luxe linens, and plenty of space to unwind after a day spent exploring. The cozy onside Bistro serves up seasonal and traditional pub fare with a modern twist, while The Wine Bar + Dining Room focuses on cocktails, fine wines and casual eats. Can't decide between coffee and wine? The Cellars & Patisserie has you covered with boutique wines, craft beers, and small-batch spirits, plus specialty coffee to enjoy in-house or take away. 

Make your way through the surrounding leafy streets, where inviting boutiques tempt eager shopping enthusiasts, while endless wineries, breweries and producers of gourmet delights beckon visitors to sample the best of the region. Those who prefer an active escape can head to the nearby Mount Lofty Summit for sweeping views.
offer_address: 52 Mount Barker Rd, Stirling SA 5152, Australia

description:
Unwind at The Crafers Hotel, a gorgeous heritage hotel in the Adelaide Hills - a picture-perfect leafy haven less than 30 minutes' drive from the city.

Built in the 19th century, the hotel was one of Adelaide's first pubs and is steeped in history. The interior pays tribute to its past with a Wine Room serving a variety of rare and classic local and international wines.
